title: Meet the Team
intro: Our leadership and ministry team serve the church family in worship, discipleship, and community mission.

members.name: Revd Luke Graham
members.bio: Luke leads the vision and teaching life of St John's Park and helps shape our mission in Park, Sheffield.

image.alt: Revd Luke Graham serving at a church barbecue

members.name: Claire Smith
members.role: Park Tots Leader and Safeguarding Officer
members.bio: Claire leads our Park Tots group for under 5s and serves as our safeguarding officer, helping us care for children and vulnerable adults across church life.

image.alt: Claire Smith helping children at an outdoor church activity

members.name: Faustina Nyame
members.bio: Faustina serves as churchwarden, supporting pastoral care and practical leadership across the congregation.

image.alt: Faustina Nyame speaking at the front of church

members.name: Elizabeth (Bess) Cooper
members.bio: Bess serves the church as a churchwarden and lay reader, helping lead worship and nurture discipleship.
